div.div:
Tomas Flidr (view short resume) (view complete resume online)
Profile
I'm an experienced web developer with various overlaps. I like solutions
with minimal dependencies and with focus on performance and longevity.
I don't surf on dev fashion and carefully consider my decisions and time.
I create information systems, ecommerce applications, open source components
and sometimes I make some training for professional programmers.
I work both alone and in a team and I have experience in managing developers.
Open source (view all)
MvcCore PHP MVC framework for both single-file tools and complex systems.
Desharp .NET debug utility for web/desktop.
Web Dev Server Comfort dev in Node.JS with "hot reload" feature.
Ext.TS Transpiler for Ext.JS docs to TS.
Work Experience
{* lecturing *}
2008 present
Lecturing Activity (Freelance)
Role: design and delivery of courses for individuals or development teams.
Delivery of courses for educational agencies: ICT Pro Ltd (majority of courses), LearnQuest Inc, PC DIR Ltd, NICOM plc and PROFIMA EFFECTIVE Ltd.
Delivery of TOP courses for the most demanding companies with professional development teams: IBM, Česká spořitelna, Komerční banka, Seznam.cz, Avast, ESET, Bosch, Foxconn…
Training for international corporations in collaboration with LearnQuest Inc.
Courses delivered domestically in Czech or internationally in English.
Delivery of courses based on predefined outlines or customized to client needs.
More than {$training->GetCount()} courses delivered over {$training->GetYears()} years, with average student rating {$training->GetRating(5)|number: '0.00'} (of 5).

Resolving technical challenges - migration of old data from the 90's, merging new databases…
Project planning and leading the development team.
Installation and management of application servers and databases.
